quote: The only way it gets better for you is when you get better.</br>^2000 Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The MAJOR key to your better future is^1000 YOU
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Life does not get better by^500 CHANCE, it gets better by^500 CHANGE.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
author: Tonny Robbins

quote: Most people fail in life because they major in minor things.
author: Tonny Robbins

quote: Our crisis is no longer material; it's existential, it's spiritual. We have so much fucking stuff and so many opportunities that we don't even know what to give a fuck about anymore
author: Mark Manson

quote: Because when we give too many fucks, when we choose to give a fuck about everything, then we feel as though we are perpetually entitled to feel comfortable and happy at all times, that's when life fucks us.
author: Mark Manson
